channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1518352295196434433
item.description:
@arxiv did you try to pursue this via grant funding and with open infrastructure+open data instead?
If so what happened? If not why not?
We'd love some backstory. We all need to learn from this.
#openscience #openinfrastructure https://t.co/hffu9tifDk

item.title: #en @ 1518325477781426184
item.description: What's so special about Web 3.0 ecosystem is enabling community to build powerful tools enhancing the product in many ways developers could not even imagine. @MetaverseMax just presented the full-featured production planner and analytics board based on the open data. Incredible! https://t.co/2apdPKLc9m

item.title: #en @ 1518183581033582596
item.description:
what i love about @DuneAnalytics: it’s the first time companies have had public resumes that the rest of us use to evaluate them.
this is the power of open data—to transform power relations so workers evaluate companies as much as vice-versa.

item.title: #nl @ 1518165410289434625
item.description: Open data.. @CarolNdosi https://t.co/ER3didMELr

item.title: #en @ 1518138113813581824
item.description:
We studied how ANPR data could be anonymized and serve as an #opendata smart city sensor for measuring how busy streets are
The results have just been published in the European Transport Research Review: https://t.co/pQcEFAJX7i https://t.co/fj3k00XZa8

item.title: #es @ 1518015889051983872
item.description:
Revisa tendencias de casos activos en Estados de tu interés, en el hipervínculo al pie. Más de 20 tableros interactivos desglosando datos abiertos y de Red IRAG por Estado, grupo de edad, comorbilidades, y otros más; actualizados diariamente.
https://t.co/Fy9BFXDu7v https://t.co/8pmIpNmrGU

【2022年4月22日 九州地方の火山性地震】
鶴見岳・伽藍岳 1回 (4/13 1回) 阿蘇山 45回 23↗︎‼️ 霧島山(えびの高原(硫黄山)周辺) 20回 7↗︎‼️※ 霧島山(新燃岳) 20回8↗︎‼️※ 桜島 1回 (4/18 3回) 薩摩硫黄島 4回 9↘︎ 口永良部島 1回 2↘︎
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ https://t.co/jVqKbM0kuJ

item.title: #en @ 1517840426807357440
item.description: Ethan Fahy, @awscloud, talked about “CMIP6 Zarr example calculations across 100s of CPU core using @dask_dev on AWS”. They performed example calculations with CMIP6 Zarr- formatted dataset from the AWS Open Data Program. Link: https://t.co/1001JXKLVs

item.title: #en @ 1517829689838129152
item.description: We see a rise in extreme poverty after a generation of progress (link). Just back from the @WorldBank #SpringMeetings with @AnneBeathe_ and this message: 1) Help Ukraine 2) Limit the emerging food crisis 3) Covid persists 4) Climate - the long term treath https://t.co/KMdgwKwsgS https://t.co/HqLvS75nuu

item.title: #es @ 1517793585806118913
item.description: RÉCORD | LLUVIA | Villanueva de Córdoba #AEMet (5390Y) cerró el día pluviométrico 22 de abril con un total de 65 mm. Valor más alto de abril en su serie de #OpenData. A 4 mm de igualar su récord de la serie (23/12/2009).

item.description: Governments often can mitigate the impact of rising inflation on poor families through social protection policies. But for many countries still reeling from the pandemic, inflationary pressures could not have come at a worse time. Read more: https://t.co/rRQdVqkOS0 https://t.co/YGNgwRqdIs

item.title: #es @ 1517695327565983744

item.title: #en @ 1517680487052898305
item.description: This list of #psychology #OpenData sources by @CameronBrick et al. is amazing 😍🙌🙌 https://t.co/gGcIi64IlA @AcademicChatter I wish this existed when I was in #gradschool. There are some amazing resources linked there for students interested in #Epidemiology too!

item.title: #en @ 1517625254985846784
item.description: There’s more to digitization of natural history specimens than transcription of their labels. Open data is just the start of new conversations and many, many new discoveries. https://t.co/OyejvhZ6Mv

item.title: #pt @ 1517601636184698884
item.description: O Open Banking estimula a competição entre instituições financeiras para oferecer serviços financeiros. O conceito é que os dados são do consumidor. O mesmo conceito pode ser aplicado a todos os setores, abrindo espaço para o Open Data, que vai revolucionar a economia. #economia https://t.co/W9PnRJLAjb

item.description: Tu pousses donc ton enquête plus loin, tu découvre un magnifique outil,le "Whois", qui tu permet de consulter des bases de données publiques retraçant des infos publiques,d'hébergement web publics. Bref,tu viens de découvrir le niveau zéro du principe de fonctionnement d'internet

item.title: #fr @ 1517533079216209920
item.description: @Terrasses_75 @ArielWeilT On a peine à le croire, mais l'autorisation est effectivement sur l'open-data ⤵️ Pas un cm2 d'espace public disponible n'échappe à la rapacité des bistrotiers avec la bienveillance d'une Mairie soumise aux intérêts privés. ➡️ A garder en tête pour les législatives. #saccageparis https://t.co/DY1b3LKB7A

item.title: #en @ 1517528533383495680
item.description: Intonation is inherently variable and the question of how the acoustic space can be split into distinct categories is quite tricky. We've a new paper on the issue. Check it out here: https://t.co/4ihZPdI2iD #openscience #opendata #intonation #trierkn #for2111 https://t.co/MIV6fVNnUH

item.title: #es @ 1517505919239741440
item.description:
#Enterate 🇵🇪 En las últimas TRES semanas, desde su primera llegada, se han distribuido 1.65 millones de dosis de #Moderna en el Perú.
Sin embargo, sólo se han aplicado alrededor de 90 mil lo cual equivale apenas el 5%.
Fuente: CENARES-MINSA #DatosAbiertos

item.title: #es @ 1517503773219991553
item.description: ¿Cuántos bosques nos quedan y cuántos hemos perdido? Este es un mapa de vegetación de Panamá, basado en la extraordinaria y meticulosa labor de la Dra Kendra Walker. Con sus datos abiertos podemos calcular cómo va la cosa. 1/3 https://t.co/FS97EMSPul

item.title: #es @ 1517500481857224706
item.description: Bueno, fruto de consultas de gente sensata, revisé el dataset. Resulta que entre Datos Abiertos y el IDE Energía, hay 1 gran diferencia. item.title: #en @ 1517490817929289731
item.description: Open Data is king👑LAION-5B is a dataset of over 5 BILLION image-text-pairs, available to download. item.title: #en @ 1517483119527538688
item.description:
Today we bid goodbye to one of the greatest leaders of our time and the best boss I could have asked for.
President Mwai Kibaki supported transformative projects such as MPESA, Open Data, Internet etc. Your foresight rewarded this country greatly.
Rest in eternal peace. https://t.co/95Q4Waf1op

item.title: #en @ 1517424716612579328
item.description:
#EarthDay2022🌍
#Copernicus🇪🇺🛰️free & #OpenData are essential for monitoring #ClimateChange-induced #drought worldwide
#DYK Chile's 🇨🇱 Lake Peñuelas has dried up due to a multiannual drought⁉️
The absence of water is visible in these #Sentinel2 🇪🇺🛰️images of ↙️2016 and ↘️2022 https://t.co/rtNatexVds

item.title: #nl @ 1517424097772412930
item.description: @pwrdbyanthony @VriesMaurits @hansvantelling @WybrenvanHaga @Europarl_EN @EU_opendata @PieterOmtzigt @CristianTerhes @hermannkelly @StevenArra @DVanLangenhove @tomvangrieken Hoe berekenen ze dat? '1 euro bij AH veroorzaakt gemiddeld zoveel CO2'? Of echt per product? Het eerste is nutteloos en misleidend, het tweede zou massale medewerking van handel vereisen - en een ernstige privacy-inbreuk.

item.title: #en @ 1517186871352348676
item.description:
#OTD in 2008, the @USGS announced that the Landsat archive would become free & open to everyone, shifting the paradigm of how remotely sensed data is used. The open archive sparked innovation and a greater understanding of global land changes.
https://t.co/FEFIieLBiy #opendata https://t.co/QbtOplODdq
